## MFAContainer.authenticateWithTOTP() method

Perform MFA using time-based one time password (TOTP) MFA authenticator.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
authenticateWithTOTP(options: AuthenticateWithTOTPOptions): Promise<User>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  options | <code>AuthenticateWithTOTPOptions</code> | Authentication options |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Promise<User>`
